entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 30 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 27 March 2023
